content.question: Scientists are interested in determining the impact of the construction of a hydroelectric dam on a population of salmon that live downstream of a populated area. They measure the health of the salmon population in its current state, several years after the dam was constructed. Which of the following would be the best to use as a control in this study?

choices.label: The health of the salmon population in the river before humans lived in the area
The health of the salmon population at the apex of the dam’s construction
The health of the salmon population just after the dam’s construction was completed
The health of the salmon population prior to any dam construction

content.answer: The health of the salmon population prior to any dam construction
